summary: Tested merged Students + Access Requests tab in Unatienda module. All features working correctly on mobile (390px) and desktop (1920px). Access Requests tab successfully removed from nav and integrated as 'Solicitudes' section within Students tab.
passed_tests: Section toggle shows 'Estudiantes (count)' and 'Solicitudes (count)' buttons - PASSED
Default section is 'students' showing student cards - PASSED
Clicking 'Solicitudes' section shows pending access requests - PASSED
Approve button visible on mobile with data-testid='approve-{student_id}' - PASSED
Clicking Aprobar opens dialog with student info, admin notes field, Confirmar/Cancelar - PASSED
Approve action works - request approved, count updates from 21 to 20 - PASSED
Toast message 'Solicitud aprobada' shown after approval - PASSED
Reject dropdown visible on mobile with data-testid='reject-{student_id}' - PASSED
Reject dropdown shows 6 quick reject reasons in Spanish - PASSED
Status filter 'Pendientes' shows pending requests with count - PASSED
Status filter 'En Revision' button present - PASSED
Status filter 'Todas' button present - PASSED
School filter dropdown 'Todos los Colegios' present with Actualizar button - PASSED
Access Requests tab removed from main nav (data-testid='tab-access-requests' = null) - PASSED
Students section shows student stats (28 students, 4 locked, 0 pre-sale) - PASSED
Students section has card/table toggle (data-testid='view-mode-toggle') - PASSED
Students section has search input (data-testid='student-search') - PASSED
Mobile floating action bar appears when students selected - PASSED
Mobile floating action bar has Pre-sale On/Off buttons and Clear - PASSED
Desktop view (1920px) shows section toggle and request cards in 3-column grid - PASSED
Pending count badge on Solicitudes section updates after approve - PASSED
context_for_next_testing_agent: Merged Students + Access Requests tab fully tested. Key data-testids: section-toggle, section-students, section-requests, requests-section, request-cards, approve-{id}, reject-{id}, req-filter-pending/in_review/all, student-stats, student-search, view-mode-toggle, mobile-action-bar. Navigation: Admin > Hamburger > Unatienda > Students tab. Login via POST /api/auth-v2/login. One request approved during testing (count went from 21 to 20 pending).

feature_verification.approve_button_mobile: PASSED - Visible with green styling and check icon
feature_verification.approve_dialog: PASSED - Opens with 'Aprobar Solicitud' title, admin notes, Confirmar/Cancelar
feature_verification.approve_action: PASSED - Request approved, count decremented, toast shown
feature_verification.reject_dropdown: PASSED - Shows 6 quick reject reasons in Spanish
feature_verification.status_filters: PASSED - Pendientes, En Revision, Todas all present
feature_verification.students_stats: PASSED - Shows student count, locked, pre-sale
feature_verification.search_input: PASSED - Search by name or student ID
feature_verification.mobile_floating_action_bar: PASSED - Appears on selection with Pre-sale buttons
feature_verification.desktop_view: PASSED - 3-column grid layout, all components visible
feature_verification.pending_count_badge_update: PASSED - Updated from 21 to 20 after approve

viewport_tests.mobile_390x844: PASSED - All features functional, floating action bar visible
